title: Dark Delights Erotica Bundle
description: The Dark Delights Bundle includes three stories: Wicked Need, Professor's Slut, and Taken by the Nerd. Each featuring different characters with different kinks getting into the hottest situations you can imagine! In Wicked Need, model Mae Banks gets more than she bargained for when she's trapped at her agent Luke's house during a hurricane. (3000 words, bondage and rough sex.) In Professor's slut, Anna is asked to be her sexy, Irish professor's research assistant, and he pays her with more than just cash! (3000 words, rough sex, professor.) In Taken by the Nerd Nora gets a sexy surprise from compu-nerd Matt when he shows up to fix her wireless internet. (3000 words, bondage, rough sex, watersports)
author: Zara Slade
